page.title: 15VILLAGE HALL
page.content:
The village hall in Little Weighton is used for a variety of activities and can be hired privately. The hall is run by the Village Hall Committee. {PLAYGROUP} Younger, pre-school children can come to the playgroup on Monday, Wednesday and Friday mornings. {LIBRARY} The library is held on Monday and Thursday. {SURGERY The doctor's surgery and waiting room are in the village hall(Mon.,Wed.,Fri)
Other regular users include:{GARDENING {CLUB; GIRLS' FRIENDLY SOCIETY; YOUTH {CLUB; DRAMA GROUP; DARBY AND JOAN AND {YORKSHIRE COUNTRYWOMEN. } Sometimes there are meetings or dances held in the hall, and occasionally birthday parties, etc.
